Klasse RoomData

java.lang.Object
com.wegapplikation.config.model.RoomData
public class RoomData extends Object
The RoomData class represents a single room entity and provides static methods for managing the persistent storage of all room data (CRUD operations) in a file.

  • Konstruktorübersicht

  • Konstruktordetails

    • RoomData

      public RoomData()
      Default constructor for creating a room object without initial data. Typically used when the class methods are called statically (though the current implementation mixes instance and static-like methods).

    • RoomData

      public RoomData(int id, String designation, boolean locked, int y, int x)
      Constructs a RoomData object with specified properties.
      Parameter:
      id - The unique identifier of the room.
      designation - The descriptive name or label of the room.
      locked - The lock status of the room (true if locked, false otherwise).
      y - The y Position on the Map
      x - The x Position on the Map

    • RoomData

      public RoomData(int id, String designation, boolean locked)

  • Methodendetails

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Gets the unique identifier of the room.
      Gibt zurück:
      The room ID.

    • getDesignation

      public String getDesignation()
      Gets the descriptive name or label of the room.
      Gibt zurück:
      The room designation.

    • isLocked

      public boolean isLocked()
      Checks the lock status of the room.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the room is locked, false otherwise.

    • getY

      public int getY()
      Gets the unique identifier of the room.
      Gibt zurück:
      The y Position.

    • getX

      public int getX()
      Gets the unique identifier of the room.
      Gibt zurück:
      The x Position.

    • isIdTaken

      public boolean isIdTaken(int id)
      Checks if a given room ID is already in use by any room in the file.
      Parameter:
      id - The ID to check for existence.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the ID is taken, false otherwise.

    • isDesignationTaken

      public boolean isDesignationTaken(String designation)
      Checks if a given room designation is already in use by any room in the file. The comparison is case-insensitive.
      Parameter:
      designation - The designation to check for existence.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the designation is taken, false otherwise.

    • getDesignationById

      public String getDesignationById(int id)
      Retrieves the designation of a room based on its ID.
      Parameter:
      id - The ID of the room whose designation is requested.
      Gibt zurück:
      The designation string, or an empty string if the room ID is not found.

    • updateRoom

      public void updateRoom(int oldId, RoomData updatedRoom)
      Updates an existing room in the storage file. It finds the room by oldId, replaces it with the data from updatedRoom, and saves the entire list.
      Parameter:
      oldId - The ID of the room to be updated.
      updatedRoom - A RoomData object containing the new information for the room.

    • getAllRooms

      public List<RoomData> getAllRooms()
      Retrieves all room data stored in the file.
      Gibt zurück:
      A List of RoomData objects. Returns an empty list if the file does not exist or an error occurs.
